scripts.comment: Open this block to see the assignment!
How can you compare two words to see if they are anagrams of one another?

block.l: keys = listToArray(keys); const zipped = listToArray(list).slice().map((v, i) => [v, keys[i]]); return Process.prototype.parseRPCResult(zipped.sort((p1, p2) => parseFloat(p1[1]) < parseFloat(p2[1]) ? -1 : 1).map(pair => pair[0]));

collabId="item_28_48"/></block><block collabId="item_28_47" s="doRun"><block collabId="item_28_46" s="reportJSFunction"><list collabId="item_28_45"/><l collabId="item_28_44">/* globals DialogBoxMorph, HandleMorph, fontHeight, Point, Morph, Color, List, SnapCloud, iframePhone */ IFrameMorph.prototype = new DialogBoxMorph(); IFrameMorph.uber = DialogBoxMorph.prototype; function IFrameMorph(title, url) { this.init(title, url); } IFrameMorph.prototype.init = function(title, url) { var myself = this; this.url = url; this.minWidth = 600; this.minHeight = 300; this.handle = new HandleMorph(this, null, null, 8, 8); this.handle.mouseDownLeft = function (pos) { myself.hideIFrame(); HandleMorph.prototype.mouseDownLeft.call(this, pos); var stepFn = this.step; this.step = function() { stepFn.apply(this, arguments); if (!this.root().hand.mouseButton) { myself.showIFrame(); } }; }; this.frame = document.createElement('iframe'); this.frame.style.position = 'relative'; this.frame.setAttribute('src', this.url); this.hideIFrame(); this.loaded = false; this.frame.onload = function() { myself.onIFrameLoad(); }; this.background = new Morph(); this.background.setColor(new Color(200, 200, 200)); IFrameMorph.uber.init.call(this); this.add(this.background); this.key = 'iframe' + url; this.labelString = title; this.createLabel(); this.addButton('hide', 'Close'); this.rerender(); this.fixLayout(); this.rerender(); }; IFrameMorph.prototype.fixLayout = function() { var th = fontHeight(this.titleFontSize) + this.titlePadding * 2; this.bounds.setWidth(Math.max(this.minWidth, this.width())); this.bounds.setHeight(Math.max(this.minHeight, this.height())); this.background.setPosition(this.position().add(new Point( this.padding, th + this.padding ))); if (this.label) { this.label.setCenter(this.center()); this.label.setTop(this.top() + (th - this.label.height()) / 2); } if (this.buttons && (this.buttons.children.length > 0)) { this.buttons.fixLayout(); this.bounds.setHeight( this.height() + this.buttons.height() + this.padding ); this.bounds.setWidth( Math.max( this.width(), this.buttons.width() + (2 * this.padding) ) ); this.buttons.setCenter(this.center()); this.buttons.setBottom(this.bottom() - this.padding); } this.fixFrameLayout(); this.handle.rerender(); }; IFrameMorph.prototype.onIFrameLoad = function() { if (this.isVisible) { this.showIFrame(); } this.loaded = true; }; IFrameMorph.prototype.isIFrameLoaded = function() { return this.loaded; }; IFrameMorph.prototype.fixFrameLayout = function() { var width = this.width() - 2 * this.padding, bh = this.buttons ? this.buttons.height() : 0, lh = this.label ? this.label.height() : 0, height = this.height() - 4 * this.padding - bh - lh; this.frame.style.width = width + 'px'; this.frame.style.height = height + 'px'; this.background.setExtent(new Point(width, height)); }; IFrameMorph.prototype.showIFrame = function() { this.frame.style.display = 'block'; }; IFrameMorph.prototype.show = function() { IFrameMorph.uber.show.call(this); this.showIFrame(); }; IFrameMorph.prototype.hideIFrame = function() { this.frame.style.display = 'none'; }; IFrameMorph.prototype.hide = function() { IFrameMorph.uber.hide.call(this); this.hideIFrame(); }; IFrameMorph.prototype.prepareToBeGrabbed = function() { this.hideIFrame(); }; IFrameMorph.prototype.justDropped = function() { this.setIFramePosition(); this.showIFrame(); }; IFrameMorph.prototype.setIFramePosition = function() { var titleHeight = Math.floor( fontHeight(this.titleFontSize) + this.titlePadding * 2, ), top = this.top() + titleHeight + this.padding, left = this.left() + this.padding, width = this.width() - 2*this.padding; this.frame.style.left = left + 'px'; this.frame.style.top = top + 'px'; this.frame.style.width = width + 'px'; }; IFrameMorph.prototype.popUp = function(world) { document.body.appendChild(this.frame); IFrameMorph.uber.popUp.call(this, world); this.setIFramePosition(); }; IFrameMorph.prototype.destroy = function() { this.frame.remove(); IFrameMorph.uber.destroy.call(this); }; CODAPMorph.prototype = Object.create(IFrameMorph.prototype); CODAPMorph.uber = IFrameMorph.prototype; function CODAPMorph() { var url = 'https://codap.concord.org/releases/latest/?embeddedServer=yes&runKey=' + SnapCloud.projectId; this.init('CODAP', url); } CODAPMorph.prototype.init = function() { CODAPMorph.uber.init.apply(this, arguments); var myself = this; this.codapPhone = new iframePhone.IframePhoneRpcEndpoint( function(command, callback) { myself.onCODAPMessage(command, callback); }, 'data-interactive', this.frame ); this.setExtent(new Point(800, 600)); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.onIFrameLoad = function() { CODAPMorph.uber.onIFrameLoad.apply(this, arguments); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.onCODAPMessage = function(message, callback) { console.log('>>> onCODAPMessage:', message); if (message.message === 'codap-present') { this.connected = true; } callback(); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.destroy = function() { CODAPMorph.uber.destroy.call(this); this.codapPhone.disconnect(); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.importVariable = function(name, fieldNames, data) { var myself = this, arrayData; arrayData = this.getJSData(data); if (fieldNames) { if (!(fieldNames instanceof List)) { throw new Error('Column names should be a list. Received ' + fieldNames); } fieldNames = fieldNames.asArray(); } else { const numColumns = arrayData[0].length; if (numColumns > 1) { fieldNames = arrayData[0] .map((_, i) => `column ${i+2}`); } else { fieldNames = ['data']; } } const isSingleColumn = arrayData[0].length === 1; if (isSingleColumn) { arrayData = arrayData.map((item, index) => [index+1, item]); fieldNames.unshift('index'); } return this.createDataContext(name, fieldNames, arrayData) .then(function() { return myself.importData(name, arrayData, fieldNames); }); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.createDataContext = function(name, fieldNames, data) { var message = { action: 'create', resource: 'dataContext', values: this.getDataContextSpec(name, fieldNames, data), }; return this.call(message); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.importData = function(name, data, fieldNames) { var myself = this, getFieldNames = fieldNames ? Promise.resolve(fieldNames) : this.getFieldNames(name); return getFieldNames.then(function(fieldNames) { var invalidIndex = data.findIndex(function(row) { return row.length !== fieldNames.length; }); if (invalidIndex > -1) { return Promise.reject(new Error('Invalid number of columns in row ' + (invalidIndex + 1) + '. Expected ' + fieldNames.length + ' but found ' + data[invalidIndex].length + '.')); } var message = { action: 'create', resource: 'collection[' + name + '].case', values: data.map(function(row) { var singleCase = {}; fieldNames.forEach(function(name, i) { singleCase[name] = row[i]; }); return {values: singleCase}; }) }; return myself.call(message); }); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.getFieldNames = function(name) { var message = { action: 'get', resource: 'dataContext' }; return this.call(message).then(function(context) { var collection = context.collections.find(function(collection) { return collection.name === name; }); if (!collection) { return Promise.reject(new Error('Could not find collection: ' + name)); } return collection.attrs.map(function(attr) {return attr.name;}); }); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.call = function(message) { var myself = this; return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) { myself.codapPhone.call( message, function(result, err) { if (err) { return reject(err); } else if (result.success) { return resolve(result.values); } reject(result.values.error); } ); }); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.getJSData = function(data) { return data.asArray().map(item => { if (item instanceof List) { return item.asArray(); } else { return [item]; } }); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.getDataContextSpec = function(name, fieldNames, data) { return { name: name, title: name, collections: [ { name: name, attrs: this.getCollectionAttributes(fieldNames, data) } ] }; }; CODAPMorph.prototype.getCollectionAttributes = function(fieldNames, data) { return fieldNames.map(function(name, i) { var isNumeric = !data.slice().find(function(value) { return isNaN(+value[i]); }); return { name: name, type: isNumeric ? 'numeric' : 'string' }; }); }; CODAPMorph.prototype.getSelection = function() { var myself = this; return this.call({action: 'get',resource: 'selectionList'}) .then(function(selection) { var messages = selection.map(function(selected) { return { action: 'get', resource: 'collection[' + selected.collectionName + '].caseByID[' + selected.caseID + ']' }; }); var requests = messages.map(function(message) { return myself.call(message); }); return Promise.all(requests); }) .then(function(cases) { return new List(cases.map(function(singleCase) { return new List(Object.values(singleCase.case.values)); }).reverse()); }) .catch(function(err) { console.error('Could not get selection from CODAP:', err); return new List([]); }); }; window.CODAPMorph = CODAPMorph; window.externalVariables = externalVariables || {};</l></block><list collabId="item_28_43"/></block></script></block><block collabId="item_28_42" s="doRun"><block collabId="item_28_41" s="reportJSFunction"><list collabId="item_28_40"/><l collabId="item_28_39">if (!window.externalVariables.codapInstance) { (window.externalVariables.codapInstance = new CODAPMorph()).popUp(world); window.externalVariables.codapInstance.hide(); }</l></block><list collabId="item_28_38"/></block></script></block-definition><block-definition collabId="item_28_37" s="reset CODAP" type="command" category="other"><header collabId="item_28_36"/><code collabId="item_28_35"/><translations collabId="item_28_34"/><inputs collabId="item_28_33"/><script collabId="item_28_32"><block collabId="item_28_31" s="doDeclareVariables"><list collabId="item_28_30"><l collabId="item_28_29">wasOpen</l></list></block><block collabId="item_28_28" s="doSetVar"><l collabId="item_28_27">wasOpen</l><block collabId="item_28_26" s="evaluate"><block collabId="item_28_25" s="reportJSFunction"><list collabId="item_28_24"/><l collabId="item_28_23">if (window.externalVariables && window.externalVariables.codapInstance) { var isVisible = window.externalVariables.codapInstance.isVisible; window.externalVariables.codapInstance.destroy(); delete window.externalVariables.codapInstance; return isVisible; }</l></block><list collabId="item_28_22"/></block></block><block collabId="item_28_21" s="doIf"><block collabId="item_28_20" var="wasOpen"/><script collabId="item_28_19"><custom-block collabId="item_28_18" s="show CODAP"/></script></block></script></block-definition><block-definition collabId="item_28_17" s="append %'data' to %'variable' in CODAP" type="command" category="other"><header collabId="item_28_16"/><code collabId="item_28_15"/><translations collabId="item_28_14"/><inputs collabId="item_28_13"><input type="%l" collabId="item_28_12"/><input type="%s" collabId="item_28_11"/></inputs><script collabId="item_28_10"><custom-block collabId="item_28_9" s="initialize CODAP"/><block collabId="item_28_8" s="doRun"><block collabId="item_28_7" s="reportJSFunction"><list collabId="item_28_6"><l collabId="item_28_5">data</l><l collabId="item_28_4">name</l></list><l collabId="item_28_3">process = arguments[2]; if (process.codapAppendData) { if (process.codapAppendData instanceof Error) { throw process.codapAppendData; } process.codapAppendData = null; return; } else if (!process.codapRequest) { var arrayData = data.asArray().map(function(row) { return row instanceof List ? row.asArray() : [row];}); process.codapRequest = window.externalVariables.codapInstance.importData(name, arrayData).then(function() { process.codapAppendData = true; process.codapRequest = null; }).catch(function(err) {process.codapAppendData = err;}); } process.pushContext('doYield'); process.pushContext();</l></block><list collabId="item_28_2"><block collabId="item_28_1" var="data"/><block collabId="item_28" var="variable"/></list></block></script></block-definition></blocks>
